Author: SwampHag4589
Text: Shrodinger’s Weight; where the absence of a scale make you simultaneously gain and lose weight.   I would suggest putting off getting new batteries. You’re really scared now, but it’s really your ED brain that’s scared; without a concrete number to bully you with, the ED has less control. Anything you do that makes that voice in your head throw an absolute tantrum, that’s a good thing. See how long you can go without knowing your weight; you will find that your anxiety over it will peak at a certain point, and then peter down.
